snippet.title: Laura Csortan's Facebook gown sale
snippet.content:
SHE has a rumoured net worth of more than one million dollars but it appears travel host Laura Csortan is out to make a quick buck. The 40-year-old has gone on the community Facebook page called, , in an attempt to sell a pricey, gold Alex Perry gown.
Csortan, who became a member on July 19 last year just months before giving birth to her daughter Layla Rose in November, posted to the page on Friday. "Stunning gold Alex Perry gown. Never worn. Size 8. Will fit size 8 or 10," she wrote last week. The purchaser of the stunning gown is in for a bargain. The Alex Perry frock, which retails for about $2000, has been uploaded for sale for just $150. The post has been since deleted. In November, Csortan shared the first picture of her newborn baby girl on Instagram. Csortan set tongues wagging when she announced her pregnancy in June, saying she would be a single mum. She did not name the father and has been adamant that she is going to keep his identity under wraps. Originally published as
